title: Doubling absolute temp of oxygen gas doubles...

content.question: When a sample of oxygen gas in a closed con­tainer of constant volume is heated until its abso­lute tem­pera­ture is doubled, which of the follow­ing is also dou­bled?

choices.label: The average velocity of the gas molecules
The number of molecules per cm3
The potential energy of the molecules

skill.text: 5.C: Explain the relationship between variables within an equation when one variable changes.
